Package com.att.aro.commonui

Contains reusable classes that provide UI components which are used throughout the ARO Data Analyzer application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AROProgressDialog Represents a progress dialog that indicates a background process such as loading, is in progress.
AROUIManager An extension of the UIManager class that contains Fields which define the look and feel of the ARO Data Analyzer application.
CheckBoxCellEditor Represents a table cell editor that is used for adding modifiable check boxes to a table.To use this class, initialize a new instance of the CheckBoxCellEditor, and add an instance of this class as the cell editor for a column on the a table.
CheckBoxRenderer Represents a check box renderer component that renders a check box in a table cell based upon the boolean value in that cell.
ColorCellEditor Represents a table cell editor that allows color selection.
ColorCellRenderer Represents a color cell renderer that sets the border and color on a table cell renderer component.
ComboBoxCellEditor Represents a table cell editor that is used for adding modifiable combo boxes in a table or tree.
ComboBoxRenderer Represents a combo box renderer component that renders a combo box in a DataTable cell.
DataTable<T> Represents a data table for use with the ARO Data Analyzer by customizing a JTable object.
DataTableCellRenderer Represents the default table cell renderer that makes default cells appear as disabled, when the table is disabled.
DataTableModel<T> Represents a base implementation for a table model that is used to display data in JTables.
DataTablePopupMenu Represents the default popup menu for a data table in the ARO Data Analyzer.
HyperlinkLabel Represents a Hyperlink label.
ImagePanel Represents an ImagePanel that is an extension of a JPanel which allows a background image.
MessageDialogFactory A factory class for displaying common message dialogs used by the ARO Data Analyzer.
NumberFormatRenderer The NumberFormatRenderer class is used to render boolean values in a table as a number that is formatted like a time value to the 10th decimal place.
RoundedBorder Represents a rounded border for button or panel objects.
TableCellRendererDefaults A static class that defines the defaults used for rendering table cells.
 

Package com.att.aro.commonui Description

Contains reusable classes that provide UI components which are used throughout the ARO Data Analyzer application.
